channel.title: [PI] How Do I Change Server Status?
channel.description: How do i make it to where when players try to connect to my server, it tells them the server is being updated? I've been googling for hours, can can't find anything.

item.title: [PI] How Do I Change Server Status?
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

There’s no really… way to do it, it would only show up like that if you did ::update 25 ingame then the people playing would log out and on there client when it would try to log in it would show that it was being updated… if they hadnt been logged in it would just be error connecting to server…if that makes sence.

Hope this helps

Read full topic
